oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Ontology for the area of Nanoscience and Nanotechnology (Ontologia para a Ã¡rea de NanociÃªncia e Nanotecnologia) is constituted by 511 terms of this field of knowledge. It was extracted from a corpus collected from the Web, with a total of 2.570.792 words
